descriptions.description: RAR is the file format of the WinRAR archiver. Like other archives, RAR files are data containers, they store files in compressed form.
RAR ist das Dateiformat des WinRAR-Archivierers. Wie andere Archive sind RAR-Dateien Datencontainer, die Dateien in komprimierter Form enthalten.

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract unrarsrc-5.0.8.tar.gz cd /work cd unrar make strip unrar.exe # "strip unrar" is not enough # "make install" would install to /usr/bin/unrar.exe mkdir ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} mkdir ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR} mkdir ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR}/bin cp unrar ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR}/bin/unrar.exe cd ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR} oegarchive unrar-5.0.8
